articles.description: A bunch of acts are pissed at the awards for a lack of "transparency" after being snubbed in the 2021 nominations.
articles.content: Following the Grammys announcing their nominations last week, a bunch of high-profile artists have slammed the Recording Academy over being snubbed, accusing the awards of some shady behind-the-scene… [+3691 chars]

articles.title: Katie Price’s daughter Princess Andre looks just like her in new pics - NEWS.com.au

articles.content: Katie Prices daughter looked the spitting image of her mum in a photo posted this weekend as she showcased full hair and makeup.The 13-year-old daughter of Katie and Peter Andre, Princess Andre, look… [+2007 chars]
